org.jplot2d.element

Interface LineAnnotation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Annotation, Element, MovableComponent, PComponent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    HLineAnnotation, HLineAnnotationEx, VLineAnnotation, VLineAnnotationEx
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HLineAnnotationImpl, VLineAnnotationImpl

    public interface LineAnnotation
extends Annotation
    A line annotation to highlight a value.

        void setStroke(@Nullable
             java.awt.BasicStroke stroke)
        Sets the BasicStroke to be used to draw the annotation line. If the given stroke is null, the default stoke will be used.

        stroke - the BasicStroke to be used to draw the annotation line
